tree.name: Rui Hachimura
tree.tradeDescription: Lakers acquired Hachimura from Wizards for Kendrick Nunn, a 2023 2nd round pick (CHI own), a 2028 2nd round pick, and a 2029 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Kendrick Nunn
assetsGivenUp.note: Former Heat guard, signed with Lakers as free agent in 2021

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 2nd Round Pick (CHI own)
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Received from Wizards as part of the 5-team Russell Westbrook trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally CHI own 2nd round pick, acquired from WAS in Westbrook trade, sent to WAS in Hachimura trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: 2028 2nd round pick, least favorable of LAL/WAS per BBRef
